attributes.action: Allow learners to have driving lessons with those in the same social bubbles
attributes.additional_details: We should at least let private lessons go ahead as long as you’re being taught by someone I. Your social bubble, this not only prevents the risk of spreading the virus but it also allows private lessons to go ahead temporarily until the restrictions are loosened so that Driving lessons with an instructor outside of your social bubble can continue.
attributes.background: having someone who is in the same social bubble who is over 25 and has a full license to provide a driving lesson on the road as this doesn’t pose a risk as you’re in a enclosed space with someone in an existing social bubble and therefore cannot pose a risk to any road users

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063

For the purposes of Covid-19 restrictions, if you are in a bubble with someone they are treated as being part of your household.
